languages.text: "Трон побери!.. Кхм. Простите, Лорд-капитан. "Обет Императора" засек усиленное излучение наших авгуров и просит разрешение на вокс-передачу данных. Как прикажете поступить?"

traits.locale_text: "Трон побери!.. Кхм. Простите, Лорд-капитан. "Обет Императора" засек усиленное излучение наших авгуров и просит разрешение на вокс-передачу данных. Как прикажете поступить?"

languages.text: "Throne take me! Ahem. Beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. The Emperor's Vow has detected the empowered emanations of our augurs and is requesting permission to initiate vox-transfer. What would you have us do?"
languages.original_text: "Трон побери!.. Кхм. Простите, Лорд-капитан. "Обет Императора" засек усиленное излучение наших авгуров и просит разрешение на вокс-передачу данных. Как прикажете поступить?"

traits.locale_text: "Throne take me!.. Ahem. Beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. Oath of the Emperor has detected the empowered emanations of our augurs is requesting permission to initiate the vox-transfer of data. What would you have me do?"

"Throne take me!.. Ahem. Beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. Oath of the Emperor has detected the empowered emanations of our augurs is requesting permission to initiate the vox-transfer of data. What would you have me do?"

"Throne take me!.. Ahem. Beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. Oath of the Emperor has detected the empowered emanations of our augurs and is requesting permission to initiate the data vox-transfer. What would you have me do?"

"Throne take me! Ahem. Beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. The Emperor's Vow has detected the empowered emanations of our augurs and is requesting permission to initiate vox-transfer. What would you have us do?"

"Throne take me! Ahem. Beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. The Emperor's Vow has detected the empowered emanations of our augurs and is requesting permission to initiate vox-transfer. What would you have us do?"

languages.text: « Le Trône m'emporte ! Hum... Je vous demande pardon, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Le Serment de l'Empereur a détecté les émissions surpuissantes de nos augures et nous demande la permission de procéder à un transfert-vox de données. Que dois-je faire ? »
languages.original_text: "Throne take me! Ahem. Beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. The Emperor's Vow has detected the empowered emanations of our augurs and is requesting permission to initiate vox-transfer. What would you have us do?"

traits.locale_text: « Le Trône m'emporte ! Hum... Je vous demande pardon, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Le Serment de l'Empereur a détecté les émissions surpuissantes de nos augures et nous demande la permission de procéder à un transfert-vox de données. Que dois-je faire ? »

languages.text: “愿黄金王座诅咒我！……咳咳，请原谅，舰长大人。帝皇誓约号探测到了我们的俄歇矩阵的能量信号，请求启动数据音阵传输。您希望我怎么做？”
languages.original_text: "Throne take me! Ahem. Beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. The Emperor's Vow has detected the empowered emanations of our augurs and is requesting permission to initiate vox-transfer. What would you have us do?"

traits.locale_text: “愿黄金王座诅咒我！……咳咳，请原谅，舰长大人。帝皇誓约号探测到了我们的俄歇矩阵的能量信号，请求启动数据音阵传输。您希望我怎么做？”

languages.text: "Der Thron hole mich! Ähem. Verzeiht, Lord Captain. Die Eid des Imperators hat die ermächtigten Aussonderungen unserer Auguren registriert und erbittet Erlaubnis, den Voxtransfer einzuleiten. Was sollen wir tun?"
languages.original_text: "Throne take me! Ahem. Beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. The Emperor's Vow has detected the empowered emanations of our augurs and is requesting permission to initiate vox-transfer. What would you have us do?"

traits.locale_text: "Der Thron hole mich! ... Ähem. Verzeiht, Lord Captain. Die Eid des Imperators hat die ermächtigten Aussonderungen unserer Auguren registriert und erbittet Erlaubnis, den Daten-Voxtransfer einzuleiten. Was soll ich tun?"

"Der Thron hole mich! ... Ähem. Verzeiht, Lord Captain. Die Eid des Imperators hat die ermächtigten Aussonderungen unserer Auguren registriert und erbittet Erlaubnis, den Daten-Voxtransfer einzuleiten. Was soll ich tun?"

languages.text: «¡Por el Trono!... Ejem. Discúlpeme, Lord Capitán. El Voto del Emperador ha detectado las intensas emanaciones de nuestros augures y solicita permiso para iniciar la transferencia de datos por voco. ¿Qué quiere que haga?»
languages.original_text: "Throne take me! Ahem. Beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. The Emperor's Vow has detected the empowered emanations of our augurs and is requesting permission to initiate vox-transfer. What would you have us do?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Por el Trono!... Ejem. Discúlpeme, Lord Capitán. El Voto del Emperador ha detectado las intensas emanaciones de nuestros augures y solicita permiso para iniciar la transferencia de datos por voco. ¿Qué quiere que haga?»

languages.text: 「王座は私のもの！…あっ、非礼をお詫び申し上げます、ロード・キャプテン。『皇帝の誓い』号が増幅したスキャナーの放射物を検出し、データのヴォクス転送を開始する許可を要求しています。どうなさいますか？」
languages.original_text: "Throne take me! Ahem. Beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. The Emperor's Vow has detected the empowered emanations of our augurs and is requesting permission to initiate vox-transfer. What would you have us do?"

traits.locale_text: 「王座は私のもの！…あっ、非礼をお詫び申し上げます、ロード・キャプテン。『皇帝の誓い』号が増幅したスキャナーの放射物を検出し、データのヴォクス転送を開始する許可を要求しています。どうなさいますか？」

languages.text: "Taht canımı alsın! Öhöm. Affedersiniz Lord Kaptan. İmparator'un Andı, alametlerimizin yaydığı kuvvetli dalgaları tespit etmiş. Voks iletişimi için izin istiyorlar. Ne yapmamızı dilersiniz?"
languages.original_text: "Throne take me! Ahem. Beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. The Emperor's Vow has detected the empowered emanations of our augurs and is requesting permission to initiate vox-transfer. What would you have us do?"
